replies.body: I have to question why they make half of the champs op straight up. I guess so they can slowly pick at it to make it weaker

Pretty sure its to make money from the people who play champs just because they are OP.

they see her in game and think "oh shit she's powerful" and run off to get some RP.

Despite every game developer out there saying that's a horrible method.

The reason new champs are "OP" is because the PBE is no way to test a champion, or feature. There is not enough data to come out of it.

Just because all companies exist to make money, doesn't mean they deliberately do something that appears underhanded to make money.
yeah that sounds about right lol
